name: VocaDB
short: Search for Vocaloid song lyrics on VocaDB.
description: This cog can fetch Vocaloid (and UTAU) song lyrics from VocaDB.net a.k.a. Vocaloid Database.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any PII data about users.
install_msg: Thank you for installing my VocaDB cog. I hope you will enjoy it.
author: ow0x
